Remarks/Remarques: Flood event in June scoured out all dams as well as the built-up silt. Curve drawn from 2 mmts before beaver activity resumed. The breakpoint at 0.98 is for the reach, whereas 0 flow is estimated to occur around 0.4m based on a measurement on the riffle control on July 31.Upper segment of the curve estimated using estimated LSPIV MMTS from 2018 as well as a cableway measurement from the 80s. Slope area measurements were not considered in this case.
clone of 4.00. change to zero value under rating

Flood event in June scoured out all dams as well as the built-up silt. Curve drawn from 2 mmts before beaver activity resumed. The breakpoint at 0.98 is for the reach, whereas 0 flow is estimated to occur around 0.4m based on a measurement on the riffle control on July 31.Upper segment of the curve estimated using estimated LSPIV MMTS from 2018 as well as a cableway measurement from the 80s. Slope area measurements were not considered in this case.
